description.value: You are adept at moving through marshy terrain. When you use the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Step]{Step} action, you can ignore difficult terrain caused by flooding, swamps, or quicksand. In addition, when you use the Acrobatics skill to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Balance]{Balance} on narrow surfaces or uneven marshy ground, you aren't @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed}, and if you roll a success on the Acrobatics check, you get a critical success instead.
